meanings.definition: The hard covering on the upper surface of the tip of each toe.
meanings.sent1: Her toenails were painted a bright red color.
meanings.sent2: I need to trim my toenails before wearing sandals.
meanings.sent3: The toenails on the statue's feet were chipped, making it look like it had been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to cleanliness was as strong as steel toenails.
meanings.sent5: The sound of toenails clicking on the floor echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: To trim or cut the hard covering on the upper surface of the tip of each toe.
meanings.sent1: She carefully toenails her nails to keep them neat.
meanings.sent2: Remember to toenails your toenails regularly to prevent ingrown nails.
meanings.sent3: He decided to toenails his toenails right before the beach trip.
meanings.sent4: The gardener had to toenails the hedge to maintain its shape.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to toenails the herbs finely for the dish.
